data.lyric:
[ti:Feel It Still]
[ar:Portugal. The Man]
[al:Feel It Still]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Feel It Still - Portugal. The Man
[00:05.59]Written by：Brian Holland/Frederick Gorman/Robert Bateman/John Hill/Asa Taccone/John Gourley/Zachary Carothers/Kyle O'Quin/Eric Howk/Jason Sechrist
[00:11.19]Can't keep my hands to myself
[00:12.82]
[00:15.89]Think I'll dust em off put em back up on the shelf
[00:18.99]
[00:19.71]In case my little baby girl is in need
[00:22.05]
[00:22.65]Am I coming out of left field
[00:25.20]Ooh woo I'm a rebel just for kicks now
[00:28.04]I been feeling it since 1966 now
[00:31.15]Might be over now but I feel it still
[00:33.95]
[00:37.28]Ooh woo I'm a rebel just for kicks now
[00:39.85]Let me kick it like it's 1986 now
[00:43.36]Might be over now but I feel it still
[00:46.14]
[00:47.50]Got another mouth to feed
[00:49.24]
[00:52.01]Leave her with a baby sitter mama call the grave digger
[00:55.72]
[00:56.53]Gone with the fallen leaves
[00:58.52]
[00:59.27]Am I coming out of left field
[01:01.69]Ooh woo I'm a rebel just for kicks now
[01:04.06]I been feeling it since 1966 now
[01:07.15]
[01:07.67]Might of had your fill but you feel it still
[01:10.75]
[01:13.69]Ooh woo I'm a rebel just for kicks now
[01:16.51]Let me kick it like it's 1986 now
[01:19.80]Might be over now but I feel it still
[01:23.05]
[01:23.89]We could fight a war for peace
[01:25.89]
[01:28.48]Give in to that easy living
[01:29.71]Goodbye to my hopes and dreams
[01:31.68]
[01:32.72]Stop flipping for my enemies
[01:34.79]
[01:35.47]We could wave until the walls come down
[01:38.10]
[01:40.56]It's time to give a little tip
[01:42.00]Kids in the middle move over till it falls
[01:45.62]Don't bother me
[01:47.02]
[01:49.73]Is it coming
[01:50.87]Is it coming
[01:52.32]Is it coming
[01:53.90]Is it coming
[01:55.41]Is it coming
[01:56.93]Is it coming back
[01:59.82]
[02:02.25]Ooh woo I'm a rebel just for kicks yeah
[02:04.29]Your love is an abyss for my heart to eclipse now
[02:08.10]Might be over now but I feel it still
[02:11.07]
[02:13.91]Ooh woo I'm a rebel just for kicks now
[02:16.86]I been feeling it since 1966 now
[02:20.24]Might be over now but I feel it still
[02:23.44]
[02:26.48]Ooh woo I'm a rebel just for kicks now
[02:29.54]Let me kick it like it's 1986 now
[02:32.47]Might be over now but I feel it still
[02:35.52]Might of had your fill but you feel it still
data.trans:
[ti:Feel It Still]
[ar:Portugal. The Man]
[al:Feel It Still]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.59]//
[00:11.19]我无法将一切埋藏心底
[00:12.82]
[00:15.89]我要重提旧事
[00:18.99]
[00:19.71]万一我的宝贝女儿需要呢
[00:22.05]
[00:22.65]我是否只是个局外人
[00:25.20]我是个反叛者 此刻只想大展身手
[00:28.04]从1966至今 我都深有感触
[00:31.15]即便那样的时代已逝 可感动犹存
[00:33.95]
[00:37.28]我是个反叛者 此刻只想大展身手
[00:39.85]让我大展身手 就像回到1986年那场大革命一样
[00:43.36]即便那样的时代已逝 可感动犹存
[00:46.14]
[00:47.50]虽然家里多了个宝贝
[00:49.24]
[00:52.01]把她留在家里有人照顾 我要重温过去
[00:55.72]
[00:56.53]岁月匆匆流逝 我也终会离去
[00:58.52]
[00:59.27]我是否只是个局外人
[01:01.69]我是个反叛者 此刻只想大展身手
[01:04.06]从1966至今 我都深有感触
[01:07.15]
[01:07.67]也许现实已经很美好了 但你仍能感受到那种鼓舞
[01:10.75]
[01:13.69]我是个反叛者 此刻只想大展身手
[01:16.51]让我大展身手 就像回到1986年那场大革命中
[01:19.80]即便那样的时代已逝 可感动犹存
[01:23.05]
[01:23.89]我们可以为和平而斗争
[01:25.89]
[01:28.48]也可以满足现状 庸庸碌碌
[01:29.71]告别我的希望和梦想
[01:31.68]
[01:32.72]不要为我的敌人助长威风
[01:34.79]
[01:35.47]我们可以齐心协力 推倒高墙
[01:38.10]
[01:40.56]该出手时就出手
[01:42.00]孩子们待在一旁 直到大功告成
[01:45.62]不要给我添乱
[01:47.02]
[01:49.73]一切是否就要来临
[01:50.87]一切是否就要来临
[01:52.32]一切是否就要来临
[01:53.90]一切是否就要来临
[01:55.41]一切是否就要来临
[01:56.93]是否又要迎来那激动的时刻
[01:59.82]
[02:02.25]我是个反叛者 只想大展身手
[02:04.29]你的爱让我深陷其中 无法自拔
[02:08.10]即便那样的时代已逝 可感动犹存
[02:11.07]
[02:13.91]我是个反叛者 此刻只想大展身手
[02:16.86]从1966至今 我都深有感触
[02:20.24]即便那样的时代已逝 可感动犹存
[02:23.44]
[02:26.48]我是个反叛者 此刻只想大展身手
[02:29.54]让我大展身手 就像回到1986年那场大革命中一样
[02:32.47]即便那样的时代已逝 可感动犹存
[02:35.52]也许现实已经很美好了 但你仍能感受到那种鼓舞
